general_info.summary: This document contains information related to "SUAT 2025 Sample Papers," with a provided source link to Sharda University's MSc Clinical Research program.
general_info.raw_content:
SUAT 2025

• Sample Papers
Source: https://www.sharda.ac.in/programmes/msc-clinical-research

career_info.summary: This text outlines career opportunities following a course, specifically mentioning Clinical Research Investigator & Coordinator roles. It notes that students in this program are typically placed with companies offering an average annual salary package between 4.50 LPA and 6.00 LPA, and it encourages individuals to take the next step towards a career in allied health sciences, with recruiters being a key part of this process.
career_info.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
• Clinical Research Investigator & Coordinator
Students of this programme are placed in companies with an average annual package of 4.50 LPA to 6.00 LPA
Take the next step towards a career in allied health sciences.
• Recruiters
